name: American Refugee Committee
description: The American Refugee Committee is an international, nonprofit, nonsectarian organiztion that has provided humanitarian assistance and training to millions of beneficiaries over the past 30 years.

name: Feeding America
description: Proper nutrition is critical to a child's development. We believe that all of us can help end child hunger in America and Feeding America's nationwide network of food banks have many programs to tailor to this all-important cause.

name: Animal Charities of America
description: Protecting pets, wildlife, and endangered species. Teching people to treat animals with love and respect. Humane training of animals as helpers and companions to people in need
